    Blogs on fluids, Python, scientific computing, Jupyter Notebooks and my experiences.

    Photo credit: European Space Agency

    Vishal Sharma, PhD

    Researcher in atmospheric-entry aerothermodynamics. I share content on fluid dynamics, aerotherm., and Python related topics.

    • India
    • Email
    • Linkedin
    • Twitter
    • GitHub
    • Instagram

    I am a researcher in aerothermodynamics of atmospheric-entry vehicles using computational methods. I am a Python programming enthusiast and during my free time I maintain NAnPack library – an open-source educational tool that I am developing for students in Computational Fluid Dynamics.

    {: .notice–info} The development version is available for download on Python Packaging Index (PyPI) and on my GitHub repository - project-NAnPack.

    Read more about my profile on About webpage.

    Feel free to email me for collaborations, seminar talks or for any other questions.

    Let’s connect on Twitter and LinkedIn.
